item.title: connect mouse events in Godot
item.description: 23:13 Thursday 14 December 2017 I have an Area2D in Godot, with its Pickable value set ON. I added a _on_Area2D_mouse_enter function, but it does not get triggered when the mouse hovers over the Area2D. Interestingly, adding a _on_Control_mouse_enter function does work. BUT, my _on_Control_input_event function does not work. 08:25 Friday 15 December 2017 https://github.com/thunderrabbit/robdot_leswiz Yay! I started a new Godot project, basing its core on https://github.com/RodZill4/godot_inventory.git Now I have functions which respond to mouse clicks and mouse entry/exit.
